Comment: We're going to see one of two things in the near future, either we're going to see the all-in mainstream change their ways or we're going to see them double down - in the latter case expect celebrations and trophies to go flying around like confetti as the fever pitch TDS gradually evolves into rolling boil TDS.  Expect your nearest TV-addict to become more unstable than they already were.
Author: D_Ethan_Bones
